channel.title: Hugo on ChenHan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on ChenHan's blog

item.title: Migrate to Hugo
item.description: Due to some software issues not fixing for long time on logdown.com [2], I decided to finding other blog solutions for hosting my tech blog. After considering several options (Such as Hugo, Ghost, Octopress, Jekyll, Jekyll-Now). The final choice goes to Hugo. Hugo is a popular static website generator which built on top of Golang. The community support is actively. Over 18 thousands stars on Hugo github repository. And Debian/Ubuntu has hugo packages which is very easily for normal user to install.
